title: Physical Therapy Leadership Development Education: ADDIE Model-Based Online Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of physical therapy and practical experience
context.additional_context: A leadership development program for practicing physical therapists conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply the 12 core leadership competencies required in physical therapy settings.
Learners can utilize a checklist to design and evaluate leadership development curricula according to the ADDIE model phases.
Learners develop leadership development plans and create actionable plans based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
